review: I really love my Chromecast, the only complain that makes it deserve 4 stars is that sometimes it "get lost" and have to reset it to factory settings and get it configured again in order to find it on my network. It does not happen really often but so far about 3-4 times in about 6-8 months.I use it mainly for Netflix and YouTube, but have a bunch of other apps for video and audio sharing that I use sporadically.I really recommend the device in case you have an old non-smart TV.

review: Those who use powerline networking (or wifi extenders) should note that there are connectivity issues. It works best if your controller device (say the phone) is using the same wifi router/switch as the one the Chromecast is connected to. When the controller device is connected to other routers/switch, there might be some problems, even though everything is on the same network.
author: Amazon Customer 47
